question:
Which among the following was/ were the reasons for the deposition of Mirjafar?
1. He has no money in his treasury
2. He failed to pay the bribe to the company and servants of the Company
3. He was involved in the conspiracy against British
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: After the battle of Plassey Mirjafar was selected as the Nawab of Bengal. In the year 1759, he started an alliance with the Dutch with the help of his agent Khoja Wajid and involved in the conspiracy against the British. At that time he has no money in his treasury. That is why he failed to pay the bribe to the company and servants of the Company. Eventually, he was expelled from the throne.
